item.title: Digital Garden Philosophy

item.title: Four Thousand Weeks - Oliver Burkeman (2021)
item.description: Four Thousand Weeks [[Oliver Burkeman]] 2021 URL: Goodreads Status: #Finished Genres: [[Philosophy]], [[Time-Management]], [[Self-Improvement]] #content/book Mental Model MM:: Most productivity books imply that with enough optimisation, that you can fit everything into your life that you want to.

item.title: How to be Perfect - Mike Schur (2022)
item.description: How to be Perfect [[Mike Schur]] 2022 Goodreads Genres [[Ethics]], [[Morals]], [[Kindness]] Status:: #Finished Rating:: 4 Mental Model MM:: A whistle stop tour of the main philosophical thinkers and theorists and how they work in practice.
